name: Keyboard Outback Vectoring
description: Allow movement vectoring as bushpig on keyboard.

name: Faster Rang Swap
description: Swapping rang is allowed before rangs return.

name: Menu Mouse Fix
description: Moves the menu options on the pause menu to prevent the mouse triggering them accidentally.

name: Disable Magnet RNG
description: Quarter pie will never spawn from baskets in place of magnets.

name: Controller Camera Aiming
description: Boomerangs will throw where camera is pointed on controller.

name: Open Game Info
description: After entering the any level, all game info will be open.

name: Opal Requirement
description: Set the number of opals required to obtain each opal thunder egg.

name: Disable Sly Shadows
description: Sets shadows to off on leaving Sly fight.

name: Disable Camera Overrides
description: Prevent the camera from being overridden in certain areas.

name: Always Show Inviscrates
description: Invis crates will always be opaque regardless of holding or using the infrarang.

name: Reduce Crate Burn Time
description: Reduces time taken for crates to break when hit with the flamerang.
